trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around November 30th 1994
Summary: i saw a disk flying above the city in the daytime
divs: Sighting Detailsi was loading my delivery truck,there were 4 other witnesses with me it was a long time ago but i want your help and input to help me refine my dates and time.it was early morning i just saw a disk not moving in the sky i was on 4th street & bainbridge in south philly the disk was to the north east it seemed to be above the delaware river from where i was.i asked my fellow employees if the were seeing it also after i got a much relived yes to my question from the south i heard the sound of a jet but could not see it the buildings blocked my view,then i could see a jet from the south go straight for the disk at high speed, the disk just went straight up and the jet went right through the spot where the disk was the jet veered to the left and the disk slowley descended back to its original spot the jet made a wide circle around center city philly and made a second run at the disk again, the disk just went straghit up and the jet went around the city again the disk just came back down slowly to its original spot ,then my co worker- who was in some service of the military said that it was a nasa jet because it had blue tipped wings i saw the blue tips but i dont know that stuff. the jet reapeared for the third pass at the disk this time the disk went up and slightly away to the east and was gone. but here is were it gets interesting my heart and my mind was going nuts i made my deliverys the i stoped at a friend house for lunch and on the tv on the news the were saying and i quote the news " dont be alarmed if you see nasa jets flying around the are only conducting tests " and they showed a still photo of a blue tipped jet on the 12:00 news i know its been years but we can find this peace of news footige i am sorry i did not date it but it was the mid 90s i can look at my old work record what year i worked at that company also to narrow it down
